overview: Program name  Hiroyuki Sawano LIVE [emU] 2021  Program content  Animations such as "Advance Giant" and "The Seven Deadly Sins", dramas such as serial TV novels "Rare", "Serial Drama W Marks Mountain" and "Serial Drama W LINK", and movies such as "Platinum Data" Hiroyuki Sawano, a multi-sound creator who has been active in providing music to artists, mainly in the drama accompaniment of the movie, and is also active in the project Sawano Hiroyuki [nZk] (Sawano Hiroyuki Nuzik), which focuses on vocal music.  Program content 2  On March 3rd, he will broadcast his latest live performance, which will also release his fourth full-length album "iv" under the name of Sawano Hiroyuki [nZk].  "Hiroyuki Sawano LIVE [emU] 2021", which will be held for two days on February 13th and 14th, is a gorgeous content featuring the soundtrack that Sawano has worked on so far. Among them, we will deliver a program composed of selected
title: Sawano Hiroyuki LIVE [emU] 2021
